commands.name: az ad app federated-credential create
examples:
az ad app federated-credential create --id xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --parameters credential.json
("credential.json" contains the following content)
{
    "name": "Testing",
    "issuer": "https://token.actions.githubusercontent.com/",
    "subject": "repo:octo-org/octo-repo:environment:Production",
    "description": "Testing",
    "audiences": [
        "api://AzureADTokenExchange"
    ]
}

commands.name: az ad app federated-credential delete
examples: az ad app federated-credential delete --id xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --federated-credential-id xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

commands.name: az ad app federated-credential list
examples: az ad app federated-credential list --id xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

commands.name: az ad app federated-credential show
examples: az ad app federated-credential show --id xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --federated-credential-id xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx
az ad app federated-credential show --id xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --federated-credential-id Testing

commands.name: az ad app federated-credential update
